titles.title: Providing for a conditional adjournment of the House of Representatives and a conditional recess or adjournment of the Senate.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

vote.text: Received in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

reference.label: text of measure as passed in Senate

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 5/25/2000--Introduced. Provides for an adjournment of the House of Representatives from May 25 or 26, 2000, until June 6, 2000, and a recess or an adjournment of the Senate from May 25, 26, 27, or 28, 2000, until June 5 or 6, 2000.
